name: psyho-robots
description:
Player controls creature which tries

to avoid security robots who hunting 
down intruders. Room also contains 
mines. Robots usually avoid mines, 
but, when creature is near them, the
machine code glitch makes them mad
and they forgetting to avoid mines.
Mines actually are robots too. There
are 3 main levels and 1 bonus one.
Each level has it's own surprises...

Music credits: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/dojokratos
